      • getCenterLocation

        public static GeoPoint getCenterLocation(java.lang.String repStr,
                                         java.lang.String coordStr)
        Get center point of NITF image coordinates
        Parameters:
        repStr - Coordinate representation ("U" = MGRS, "G"/"C" = DMS, "D" = DD)
        coordStr - 4-point Coordinate string (see NITF 2.0 spec for formatting)
        Returns:
        Geo-point conversion of coordinate string, or null if failed

      • getCenterLocation

        Parameters:

        outWidth - Output width (optional)
        outHeight - Output height (optional)
        Returns:
